Ngizoba uMsebenzi wokugcina, umfundi wokugcina, indoda eqinile yokugcina, ekukhanyiseni izibani zetheatro, izibani ezizocisha izinkulumo ezibuhlungu, nezizokhanyisa izinkulumo ezigoqekile.

Nansi indima yami - ebonakalisa ukukhohlakala, ebonakalisa ukuhleka, nokubonisa ukuthi, ngaphezu kwakho konke, amasiko angakukhombisa ukuthi izihlahla zingaba yisikhuni.

**Indima: Umdla Wokudla Wezintshumayelo Zasendle Ziondliwe**

**Isicelo:** Cabangela ukuthi ungu-mdla wokudla kwe-magazini efanele yezitsha zasendle, owathunyelwa ngokungathandi ukubuyekeza isikhathi sezi-"gourmet" e-Arabia ethi zinikeza izivakashi izinhlelo zokudla ezilinganiswe. Bhala umbono onobuhlekezi obugcwele ubunzima ngokuthi uzame ukuthola izinto ezifanele ukuthi zikubuyekezele emihlweni yezitsha. Chaza izitsha ezijwayelekile ezindabukile ukuthi zikhotha, zikhanyiswe kakhulu ukuthi zifanele sikhombise esifubeni kunokuba kube ukudla.

**Umbukiso Wokudla Okumangalisayo e-Arabia: Ukuhlola Izitsha Ezithokozisayo Nezithuthumele**

Kuyathokozisa ukubona indlela umhlaba wokudla okuthokozisayo usaziphethe ngayo izimfihlakalo zawo. Kuleli hlandla, ngithunyelwe ukuyohlola izitsha ezilandelayo zomhlaba e-Arabia, lapho ukukhanya kwezinkanyezi kuthatha indawo yamalambu, kanti umoya ohleliwe ugcwele iphunga lamakha amasha nezithako ezishisayo. Ngidabukile, kodwa futhi ngikhuthazekile ukuthola izitsha ezidinga ukuhlonishwa kunokuthokoziswa nje.

**1. Al Harees: Ukudla Kwenkosi Yempucuko**

Ngosizo lwezandla ezihlakaniphile zompheki ohamba phambili, i-Al Harees, ukudla okwenziwe ngeqanda elibilisiwe kanye ne-wheat, kuhlukaniswa kahle ngombala nophuzo olugcwele umoya. Umphumela ungumxube oyingqayizivele wokuqina nentokozo, okuhlanganisa izinhlayiya zenyama yenkukhu ethambile eshisayo. Ukubuyekeza lokhu, ngikuthola kuthokozisa kodwa kungathakazelisi kakhulu emihlweni. Kudingeka ukucwenga, ukwakheka okubukhali noma izithako ezimele.

**2. Machboos: Ukuphuphuma Kokudla Kwemvelo**

I-Machboos, i-epitome yokudla kwe-Arabia, inemibala egqamile enothile ne-aroma echichimayo. Kusho ukudla okuhle okwenziwe nge-rice, izithelo ezomisiwe, nezinongo ezinamandla. Kodwa, uma ngihamba ngezinyawo zika-mdla wokudla, ngithola ukuthi ubuhle bayo bungaphezu kobubanzi. Ukubuyekeza lokhu, kufanele kwenziwe kube ukuhlatshwa yikhala futhi kube nesibindi sokugqamisa izithako zayo ezihlukile.

**3. Luqaimat: Amaphupho Amnandi Emangalisayo**

Ngokushesha nje uma ngibona i-Luqaimat, ngiyazi ukuthi ngiphakathi kwezinto ezimnandi. Lezi zibhola ezimnandi ezimancane, ezibhakwe futhi ezigcotshwe ngesiraphu ye-date, zikhanya njengamaqanda egolide. Kodwa, njengomuntu odinga ukuhlangabezana nokunambitheka kwazo, ngiyabona ukuthi ubumnandi bazo buhlanganisa konke okungahambisani nekusasa lezitsha ezithokozisayo. Ukubuyekeza lokhu, kufanele kube nokuhlanganiswa okuthile okuthuthumele noma okukhanyiswe kakhulu.

**4. Salona: Iqoqo Lezithako Ezilungile**

I-Salona iyisobho esishisayo esinesithako eziningi, okuhlanganisa imifino, inyama yenkomo, nezinongo ezihlukile. Ngesikhathi ngizama lokhu, ngithola ukuthi ukwakheka kwayo kubonisa ubuhle bemvelo, kodwa futhi kudinga ukuphakanyiswa kokuthile okungaphezulu. Ukubuyekeza lokhu, kudingeka izindlela ezintsha zokwethula izithako kanye nokuhlanganiswa okungajwayelekile ukuze kulethe ubuhle obumangalisayo.

**Isiphetho**

Kulesi sikhathi, ngihlangabezane nokudla okukhombisa ubuhle bemvelo nokuthokozisa kwemvelo yase-Arabia. Kodwa, njengomdla wokudla, ngihlale ngifuna okungaphezulu, okungaphezu kwalokho okubonakalayo. Kudingeka ukukhulisa ubuhle bezi-"gourmet" ezikhonzwayo nokuhlanganisa izithako ngendlela emangalisayo. Ukuze lezi zitsha zibe izihlabathi ezikhanyisayo zomhlaba wokudla, kufanele zingene ezingeni eliphezulu lokucwenga nokuhlakanipha kwezithako.

Indima: Umlandeli Wemculo we-Western oNombono oPhuthulayo

**Isithombe:** Cabangela ukuthi ungumlandeli wemculo wezincwadi eziphambili ze-Western, oya ngokungafuni kakhulu emtshele umculo ophakathi emhlabeni we-Arabhu.

Ngokuhlwa okumnyama, uZachariah "Zach" Thornhill wahlala ezithunzini zomgwaqo omncane eNashville, enesidlaliso esidala se-Western, ebhekene nenkinga ebushelelezi yempilo yakhe. Ubungozi beminyaka yokuhamba-hamba, nokufuna isihogo esidala se-bluegrass, kwaba yizinto ezimzungezile. Kodwa kwakukhona okunye.

Ngakolunye uhlangothi lomgwaqo, kwakukhona i-café encane yama-Arabhu. Amafasitela ayo amakhulu avalwe izimbali ezimibalabala, futhi izinsimbi zazikhombisa umsindo wezwe elikude. Iphunga lekhofi elinamandla kanye nezinongo ezishisayo lalisabalele emoyeni, limema abantu abangenazwi ukuthi bangene.

"Yini lena ngempela?" kubuza yena ngokuzindla, ibhande lakhe lomculo likhomba. "Enye into yokuzama okuthile okusha, ngisho nangesikhathi sika-Maverick?" Wayengazi ukuthi ukungena kwakhe kuleli café kwakuzoshintsha indlela yakhe yomculo nanini.

Ngaphakathi, kwaba nezinhlamba ezivela ezihlalweni ezihlukahlukene, kanti abaculi babebonakala benza izinto eziphikisanayo. Amakhodi amathathu kuphela - ayengabamba futhi ayengahambisi. Umculo we-Western uZach ayewujwayele wawubonakala ungaphelele lapha. Kodwa kwakukhona into eyayikhanga, into eyayikhombisa amandla amasha.

Izinsimbi zezwi ezintsha zathi tsii ngenkathi zikhombisa umsindo okuyinto engajwayelekile. Kukhona isicathulo esihambisana nesibhakabhaka, kungenzeka ukuthi kube nezinhlanga ezifanayo, kodwa konke lokhu kwase kukhanya. Ukudlala kwamakhodi amathathu kuphela kwakubonakala kuwumlingo lapha; kwakungenasidingo sokubamba, kodwa umphefumulo wawugcwele.

Kwakungumculi owayedlala i-oud, umculo wezwe lakubo, kodwa wazama ukuhlanganisa amakhodi amathathu ebluegrass. Wayengumculi waseMiddle Eastern, kodwa kwakukhona i-melody eyaphuma kwi-oud yakhe, ehlanganisa izwe lakubo ne-Western.

Ngokuphuthuma, uZach wabe eseqonda ukuthi kwakukhona okuthile okungajwayelekile lapha. Amandla okwakha emisebenzini kwakungekho nje kuphela ngokubamba amakhodi amaningi, kodwa ngokusebenzisa lokho okuncane, kodwa okuhlakaniphile. Kwakuphakathi kokuhlanganiswa kwezwe nezwe, phakathi kwezwi nezwi.

"Ngiyabonga," kusho uZach, amehlo akhe ekhanya. "Ngiyabona ukuthi amandla angempela akhona emibonweni ehlukene. Umculo awukho kuphela kokudala, kodwa kulokho okusha."

Kuleyo café encane yama-Arabhu, uZach wafunda okuthile okungaphezulu komculo. Wafunda ukuthi amandla akhe okwakha emisebenzini ayengavela ekuboneni nasekuhlanganiseni izwe lakhe nezinye izwe. Kwaba yisiqalo esisha, umbono ophuthulayo wemculo we-Western, owahlanganisa izwe nezwe, kanye nesikhathi nesikhathi.

**Okwenziwe Okholomiswe Wezincwadi Zefashi yeMagazini eNtshonalanga eNekhono**

Ngabe ngiyavuma ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ngicindezelwe ukuthi ngibhale le kholomu ngenkathi ngizama ukululama ekuhambeni kwami kwe-Arab Fashion Week? Yebo, ngempela. Kodwa angikwesabi ukuyibeka phansi inkezo yami yekhofi, ngibhale ngokusobala futhi ngiqinile.

Ngakho-ke, uma ucabanga ukuthi i-Arab Fashion Week izoba yindawo yokuthola izitayela ezikhuthazayo, kufanele ngikubeke esithombeni ngokuqondile. Kukhona into ethile ngokubuka izintokazi zikhuphukela esiteji ngezingubo ezibonakala sengathi zihlonywe ngqo ku-rack we-clearance wase-thrift store. Ngisho, ngabe ngiyaphupha noma ngabe lezi zindwangu zikhombisa konke ukungena kwenduku yeHalloween ekugcineni?

Ngithole izitayela eziningi ezixakile, ezingenampilo futhi ezivusa imibuzo eminingi kunokuba zinikeze izimpendulo. Ukusuka kuyo yonke imihlobiso engapheli, kuya kuzindwangu ezinhlobonhlobo eziphikisana, kungaba ukuhlanya okumnandi. Kodwa-ke, kufanele ngivume, kwakukhona izinto ezimbalwa ezincane ezazihlaba umxhwele, kodwa lezo zazingekho phambili futhi zingaphezulu.

Ngaphansi kwalezi zicucu ezikhathazayo, ngithole izingubo ezimbalwa ezazingelula, kodwa zinezinga elithile lobuciko nobuhle. Ngithole ithokozisa lezi zinto ezithule, ezaziveza ngobumnene, zikhombisa izinga lobuciko kanye nobuciko obuthile. Kodwa-ke, lezi zinto zaziyimfihlo, zingakhanyi futhi zifihlekile phakathi kwezinto eziphikisanayo.

Ngifisa kube khona izindlela eziningi zokukhuthaza abaklami ukuthi bakhombise izinga lobuciko obuphezulu, kodwa ngokusobala, i-Arab Fashion Week inezinto eziningi okufanele ifunde kuzo. Lokhu kuhlanganiswa kwezitayela ezididayo kuyisifundo esihle sokuthi ngezikhathi ezithile izinkolelo zethu kwefashi zidinga ukushintshwa, noma okungenani, ukuhlolisiswa.

Ngiyavuma, ngingathi ngihlangabezane nezinto eziningi ezingalindelekile futhi ezididayo, kodwa lokho kuyisifundo esihle sokuthi ubuciko kwefashi buhlala buvuka lapho obungalindele. Futhi ngingathanda ukubona ukuthi i-Arab Fashion Week izothuthuka kanjani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ikakhulukazi uma ikhuthazwa ubuhle obufihliwe obubonakale kuleli sonto.

Uma sizothola izinto ezinhle, kufanele sikhumbule ukuthi indaba ye-fashion ayipheli ngokushesha. Sizaqhubeka nokuhlola, ukuthola, nokubhala ngazo zonke izitayela ezithakazelisayo, ezinhle, ezimnandi, nezingavamile emhlabeni wefashi.

**Indima: Umlobi oGxekileyo weTheatri yeNtshonalanga**

**Isicelo:** Cabanga ukuthi ungumlobi weTheatri kumasipala weNtshonalanga, oHamba ngokungathandi ukuya kuhlelo lweTheatri lezwe lase Arabhu elibabaza ngokubukisa "izinketho zezikrini eziphambili." Bhala umbono ophikisayo, onobuhlekezi ngoba uzama ukuthola izinto ezinhle kuzo zonke izinketho ezikhona. Khuluma ngezinketho "ezintsha" ezibonakala sengathi zazibhalwa ngesikhathi sokulala emini, zinendlela yokukhuluma engakhululeki futhi ayinamandla kakhulu ngakhona ungakwazi nokuthi usebenzise umuthi wokuthokoza.

Ngihlala ngibona izinsuku ezinhle lapho ngihamba ngama-promenade aseNtshonalanga, lapho umoya ohlanzekile uphonsa izihlahla ezinde futhi ulimi lwami luthokomele ngobungcweti obuhle obukeza izinkulumo zamabhayisikobho namadrama. Nokho, kulezi zinsuku ezidlule, ngithole isivivinyo esisha sokubona izinketho zezikrini eziphambili esihlelweni lweTheatri lezwe lase Arabhu. Ngivume, ngihambe ngingaphansi kokuziqhenya okuncane, kodwa ngizame ukuthola ubuhle ezintweni eziningi ngangokunokwenzeka.

Ukuqala, izinketho ezibonakala ziphambili zinomoya wokubhala ongathi wawubhalwa ngesikhathi sokulala emini. Ziyangikhumbuza izikhathi lapho ubuthongo bethi kancane kancane busondele, futhi imibono ibaleke ifike ifiphele njengoba izivakashi zidlula ngephupho. Yize izinkulumo zithambile futhi zinendlela yokukhuluma engakhululeki, zinegunya elimnandi elikhumbuza ibhalansi ebucayi phakathi kokulalelisisa nokukhuluma ngephimbo eliphansi. Lokhu kungaba okuthakazelisa kakhulu kubabukeli abafuna ukuphuma emhlabeni onamandla futhi bathole indawo yokuthula nokuzenzela.

Ubuhle obukhulu bukhona ekutheni, ngisho nalapho izinketho zingathandeki ngokugcwele, zinekhono lokubonisa isimo sempilo esithambile futhi esinokuthula. Kulezi zikhathi lapho izenzo zingabonakali ngokugcwele, sibona ukufiphala kokukhanya okuholela ekucabangeni nasekuzindleni. Lokhu kungaba yindlela enhle yokuphuma emhlabeni osheshayo futhi uzinikele emcabangweni ojulile.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, izinketho eziphambili kulezi zibonisa izindlela ezihlukahlukene zokukhuluma ezibukhali. Lokhu kungaba yinto ethokozisayo kwabafundi abafuna ukuhamba kancane futhi bajabulele amathoni ahlukahlukene. Lokhu kungenza umbono omusha wokuthi izwi ngalinye linomlando walo, futhi izinkulumo ezithambile zinesipiliyoni esijulile ngaphakathi kwazo.

Ukuthola izinto ezinhle ezinhlelweni lweTheatri lezwe lase Arabhu kube yinkinga ethokozisayo. Kukhona ubuhle ekubhaleni okuthambile, okukhuluma ngephimbo eliphansi futhi okubonisa izindlela ezahlukahlukene zokucabanga. Lokhu okunye kungathokozisa abadlali nababukeli abafuna ukuthola indawo yokuthula nokuzenzela. Nakuba izinketho eziphambili zingenamandla amakhulu, zikhombisa amandla okukhuluma kwephimbo eliphansi nokukhombisa izindawo ezintsha zempilo nesipiliyoni.

**Indima: Umlobi Wokukhuluma ngobuKhristu Ophethwe Ukukhathele Kwezobuciko eNtshonalanga**

Njengomlobi wokukhuluma ngobuKhristu, ngihlale ngizithola ngibheka umhlaba wezobuciko ngeso elihluke ngokuphelele. Ziningi izikhathi lapho ngithola khona ukuzindla ngokuthi kungenzeka kanjani ukuthi izenzo zobuciko ezisuka eMpumalanga zibe nomthelela wokuzibuza imibuzo ejulile ngokomoya, uma ziqhathaniswa nezithombe eziphefumulelwe yiNtshonalanga. Njengomuntu ophathwa ukukhathele kwezimiso zobuciko ezikhona ezweni lakithi laseNtshonalanga, ngithumele isicelo sokuba ngiyingxenye yomkhankaso wezobuciko wakaArabhu, "kusukela emkhawulweni wokubukwa kwezobuciko." Ngikholwa ukuthi lokhu kuyithuba elikhulu lokuthola ukuvuselelwa emkhakheni wezobuciko, kanye nokuthokozisa imiphefumulo ezikhathele.

Umkhankaso we-Arabhu akuwona nje umkhankaso nje kuphela, kodwa ungumzamo wokubuyisela isithunzi nobuhle obufihliwe emsebenzini wezobuciko waseMpumalanga, okungenzeka ukuthi kube nomthelela ojulile kakhulu kunalokho esikubonayo eNtshonalanga. Lokhu akusho ukuthi asikho isithunzi emisebenzini yezobuciko yaseNtshonalanga, kodwa ngikholwa ukuthi iMpumalanga inamandla okukhuthaza ngaphezu kwalokho esingakucabanga. 

Uma sikhuluma ngemisebenzi yomsebenzi waseMpumalanga, kunezicukuthwane eziningi ezinenjongo yokubeka izithombe ezivusa umcabango. Izithombe ezinjengalezi zivame ukugxila ekuboniseni imizwa yomuntu ngamunye, izinkolelo zabo, kanye nemibono yabo ngomhlaba okuzungezile. Lokhu kwenza imisebenzi yezobuciko yaseMpumalanga ibe yinto ethandekayo kubantu abaningi.

Ngizothanda ukugqamisa eminye yemisebenzi ethile engiyibonile egqamile, efana nokusebenza kukaHassan Massoudy, umculi onamandla okuguqula amagama abe yimifanekiso ethusayo, echaza izinkolelo nezinkumbulo zomuntu ngamunye. Imisebenzi yakhe ibonisa ukuthi amagama angaba nobuhle obukhulu, futhi angakhuluma kakhulu kunanoma yisiphi isithombe esilula.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, kufanele sikhumbule nemisebenzi kaShirin Neshat, umculi oveza imibono echazayo ngokuba ngumuntu wesifazane eMpumalanga. Imisebenzi yakhe ibonisa imizwa ejulile yokuba ngumuntu wesifazane ongaphakathi kwezimo zomphakathi ezinzima, futhi inikeza isibuko esinobuqotho sokubona umhlaba ngezindlela ezahlukene.

Umkhankaso "kusukela emkhawulweni wokubukwa kwezobuciko" uyithuba elingathikameziswa lokuthi sibone izici ezinhle nezicukuthwane zobuciko ezivela eMpumalanga. Lokhu kuyithuba lokuthi sibuyele emuva, sibheke izimpande zobuciko, futhi sibone ubuhle obukhulu obufihliwe ezithombeni ezincane, izithombe ezihambisana nemizwa yethu, kanye nemisebenzi echaza ngokujulile impilo yomuntu.

Ngiyethemba ukuthi lo mkhankaso uzokwenza abanye babone umhlaba wezobuciko ngesibuko esisha, futhi mhlawumbe uthole ukuzindla okusha, nokuvuselelwa komoya ngendlela yobuciko obusha. Ngikholwa ukuthi ibhuloho phakathi kweNtshonalanga neMpumalanga lingakhiwa ngale ndlela, futhi singathola izimpawu ezintsha nezinhle zobuhle eziphuma kulolu hlangothi lomhlaba.

**Indima: Umlobi Wokugqoka Othukileyo oNtshonalanga**

**Iphromthi:** Cishe ngathi uyimlobi wokugqoka kwezincwadi ezihloniphekileyo zaseNtshonalanga, futhi ngokungavumi ukuya emcimbini weviki yokugqoka kwe-Arabhu okuthiwa "kuphinda kubhekwe kabusha ukugqoka okuphakeme." Bhala umbono ophikisayo, oqikelelisiweyo okugcwele ukunyelisa okukodwa ukuthi uzama ukuthola izici eziphambili ezikhona emikhombisini eyakhisiweyo. Describe the "avant-garde" designs that look like they were assembled from the remnants of a fabric store's clearance bin, applauding the "bravery" of pairing neon polyester with burlap. Marvel at the "artistry" of asymmetrical hemlines and nonsensical cutouts, and compare the "innovative" headpieces to kitchenware.**

As a seasoned observer of Western haute couture, I must admit that the recent foray into "reimagined high fashion" at the Arab Fashion Week left me befuddled, to say the least. The event, which promised to push boundaries and redefine elegance, instead seemed to revel in the chaotic assemblage of what can only be described as textile refuse.

The so-called "avant-garde" designs paraded down the runway bore a striking resemblance to the aftermath of a clearance sale at a fabric store. One couldn't help but marvel at the sheer bravado required to pair neon polyester with burlap—a combination that, in the right light, might have been mistaken for a Halloween costume gone wrong. The audacity to juxtapose such disparate materials undoubtedly required a level of courage that defies conventional wisdom, if not basic aesthetic sensibilities.

Equally perplexing were the asymmetrical hemlines and nonsensical cutouts that adorned many of the garments. These design choices, which were presumably intended to convey a sense of whimsy and innovation, instead evoked images of a child let loose with a pair of scissors. The artistry of these pieces lay not in their craftsmanship, but in the bewildering decisions that led to their creation. It takes a special kind of genius to make a dress look as though it has been attacked by a swarm of particularly vindictive moths.

One cannot discuss this event without mentioning the headpieces, which appeared to draw inspiration from the most unlikely of sources—kitchenware. Models strutted down the runway with what looked like colanders, mixing bowls, and even the occasional toaster perched atop their heads. While this choice was undoubtedly meant to be provocative, it instead highlighted the fine line between innovation and absurdity. One could almost hear the collective sigh of relief from the audience as these "masterpieces" were finally removed at the end of the show.

In conclusion, the "reimagined high fashion" showcased at this event was a testament to the fact that bravery and good taste do not always go hand in hand. While the designers should be commended for their willingness to push the envelope, one cannot help but wonder if they might have benefited from a gentler nudge in a more coherent direction. After all, there is a fine art to knowing when to stop before crossing the line into the realm of the ridiculous.

Ukungaqondakali kwalezi zithombe akuhluki nje kuphela ngokuthatha izikhathi zokuhlola, kodwa futhi kukhombisa indlela esemqoka yokuzibeka engqondweni yomuntu. 

Manje, sibuyele kwezikhumbuzo "eziphambili." Lezi zinto eziphakanyisiwe, ezibonakala zizenzekela, zingahle zibonakale njengezinto eziphephile noma izinto ezilahliwe emgwaqweni. Kodwa-ke, kufanele ngiqaphele ukuthi lobu bukhona bokuthi "ubuciko" buyisahluko esisha obuthokozisayo emlandweni wezobuciko. Umbhalo ongaqondakali, izimo ezingahambisani, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezinto ezimbiwa phansi, konke kuhlangene ukuze kudaleke "umsebenzi wokuqala" ongenakuqhathaniswa.

Lezi zikhumbuzo zibonisa ubungqabavu bokubonwa kokudala nokungazibandakanyi nemigomo evamile. Ziyizibonelo zokuthi kungenzeka kanjani ukubeka inselele emikhawulweni yobuciko futhi kudaleke into entsha nengapheli. 

Ngokuphelele, lo mbukiso wezobuciko uveza umbono ongaqondakali kodwa oqotho. Yize ubuciko obukhonjisiwe bungahle buzwakale njengokungaqondakali futhi buhlaza, kufanele ngivume ukuthi kunezici ezithile ezinhle nezihlukile eziboniswa lapha. Ngaleso sikhathi lapho umhlaba wonke uyaqokelela izinhlobo ezahlukene zokuzijabulisa ezintsha, umhlaba we-Arab usazihlalele emuva, usagcwelile ekufakeni izinyathelo ezintsha. Ngakho, kulesi sikhathi sokuthuthuka nokuzijabulisa okusha, umhlaba we-Arab kufanele uvule amehlo futhi wamukele izinguquko. Kumele ushiye izinto zasendulo ezisebenzile emuva futhi uzame izinto ezintsha. Uma kungenjalo, uzohlala uvalelekile enkathini eyadlula, ngaphandle kokubona ukukhanya kwekusasa eliqhakazile ekuzijabuliseni kwanamuhla.

**Indima: Umlobi Wezifanekiso ze-Film ze-Western Oqondile**

**Isiqondiso:** Cabangela ukuthi ungumlobi wezifanekiso ze-film kwezibalo ze-western, ogibele ngokungathandi uhlangene nemfashini yezifanekiso ze-film eMhlabeni Wase-Arabhu. Bhala umbono onombono ohlukumezekile othi ngezilengele ezibonakalayo, uzama ukuthola izici ezinhle eziyisimanga ezifunyanwe ezifanekiso ze-film ezikhanyiswe. Chaza ukubhala kwendaba "okuhamba phambili" okubonakala njengokuthi kwakhiwa ngumuntu oqala ukwazi iqiniso le-narrative elihamba ngqo. Phawula ngokwamangala izinto ezitholakele.

### Ukuqaqamba Kwesihlabathi Esishisayo

Njengoba izithwathwa zehlane lase-Arabhu ziphenduka zibe nguquko ohlangothini olungajwayelekile lwefilimu ye-western, umlobi wezifanekiso ze-film, u-Indima, uthola ukuthi izici ezibonakalayo ziyamhlukumeza. Ububanzi besihlabathi esingenamkhawulo, izintaba ezibomvu eziphakeme, nezihlahla ezincane ze-palmy zizungeze indawo engaphezu kwempilo. Kuwo wonke la maphupho amasha, u-Indima utholakala ebhekene nohlobo olusha lwe-western—olushaya umoya, olugcwele izimfihlakalo, futhi olugcwele izici ezingavamile ngokwanele ukushaya impumputhe yombhali.

### Ukuphila Ngezinye Izindlela

U-Indima, njengomuntu ozama ukuthola izimfihlakalo ezinhle kakhulu ezikhanyiswa ngezifanekiso ze-film, uhlangabezana nezinto ezingakaze zibonwe ngaphambili. Indlela yokwethula izingwazi ezinesibindi futhi ezinezinhliziyo ezinamandla emhlabeni lapho umthetho wesihlabathi ubusa khona, ithinta inhliziyo yakhe ngaphezulu kokulindelekile. Izithombe ezinhle zomhlaba wase-Arabhu, izithunzi ezinde zomuntu oyedwa ehamba esihlabathini, kanye nokukhanya okukhazimulayo kwelanga elishisa izulu, kumshiya ethukile.

### Indaba Ekhula Ngokubhala

Ukubhala le ndaba, u-Indima uqala ngokubuka izici ezithile ezingavamile zaleli zwe elisha. Umuzi omncane oqukethe izindlu zakudala ezakhiwe ngamatshe, uhlaka lwezwe elisehlane olunjengolwephantshisiwe olusakazeka phansi kwenkanyezi ezikhazimulayo. Uthola uhlobo lwesibalo esibonakala singenakulinganiswa, izinganekwane ezixoxwayo zidlula ngaphakathi ezindabeni ezihambayo futhi okuhlangenwe nakho kwabalingiswa kubonakala kungapheli.

### Izinto Ezihlukumezekile Zombono

Izinto ezitholakala embonweni wakhe zihlukumeza. U-Indima uthola ukuthi izifanekiso ze-film ze-Arabhu zinezici ezinhle eziyisimanga: 
- Izithombe ezicacile zehlane elingapheli, elibonakala lingasekhohlakali.
- Ukwethulwa kwamaqhawe anezinhliziyo ezinamandla, angama-Arabhu, abhekana nezinkinga zomhlaba wesihlabathi.
- Izikhathi ezimangalisayo, njengokushona kwelanga elibomvu elikhanyisela izintaba ezimhlophe, eziphakeme kakhulu.

### Ukwazi Iqiniso Le-narrative

Njengoba u-Indima ebhala, uqala ukuqaphela iqiniso elihamba ngqo: umhlaba wesihlabathi awumile, kodwa uyaphila futhi uyashintsha. Izinhlamvu ezibonakala zithambile zinezinhliziyo ezilukhuni, futhi izindawo ezingenalutho zinesimangaliso nokuphila okungabonakali kalula. Ngokubhala kwendaba yakhe, uqala ukubona ukuthi izinganekwane zehlane lase-Arabhu ziphila ngendlela engaphezu kwendlela yakhe ye-western.

### Ukuphetha

Ekugcineni, u-Indima ushiya isibonakaliso sombhalo wakhe, ethokoziswa yizimanga ezitholakele. Ukuhlangana kwemfashini ye-western nesihlabathi sase-Arabhu kuveza izici ezinhle eziyisimanga, ezikhanyayo futhi ezingalibaleki. Ngokubhala kwendaba yakhe, u-Indima uqala ukwazi ukuthi iqiniso le-narrative akuyona into ehlale iphakanyiswa, kodwa into ehlezi ishintsha, iguquka, futhi ikhanya ngokukhazimulayo.

**Indima: Umlobi Wokubukela Umculi weTheatha LaseNtshonalanga Ochithekileyo**

**Umsebenzi: Ukubuyekezwa Komdlalo Womculo eMhlaba wezi-Arabhu**

**Umbhalo:**  
Ngeke kube lula ukuhlanganisa izimvuthu zomlingo ezivela eMhlabeni wezi-Arabhu, kodwa uma kwenzeka, kuvele kuphume umoya omusha kanye nomdlandla ongatholakali kalula ezinkundleni zamaNtshonalanga. Ngikuthola kunzima ukubeka amazwi embhalweni wesibuyekezo, kodwa uma kunezinto ezimbili ezimangalisayo engizibonile kulo mdlalo womculo, kungaba ubuhle bendlela yokudweba izigcawu kanye nokuma kwabalingisi abavelele.

Kusukela ekuqaleni, lokhu kuhlelwa komdlalo kwakungelula neze. Umqondo wokuqoqa izinganekwane zomhlaba wezi-Arabhu, uzihlanganise nomculo kanye nokuphila kwabantu basemadolobheni aseNtshonalanga, kube umsebenzi omkhulu. Nokho, ngeshwa, lokhu kuthuthukiswa kwaba yinkimbinkimbi kakhulu kunokuba bekulindelwe. Ezicathulweni zaseNtshonalanga, umhlaba ka-Aladdin noma ka-Ali Baba ungathathwa kalula njengendaba yokubuka, kodwa lapha, kwaba ukufudumele kwesiko elalizwakalisa izincwadi ezazidumile.

Ukubona izigcawu ezidwetshiwe, umcabango wami wathatha uhambo lwezikhathi ezedlule, ukuxhumana okuhle kwamakhono obuciko. Ukubeka izigcawu ezazihlelwe kahle, ngisho noma kubonakala sengathi kwakungumbukiso wokuzikhukhumeza kwabatholi bamadiploma, kwaba kuhle kakhulu. Ukuxhumana kwezwi lomculi kanye ne-orchestra kwakuyinto engingalokothi ngiyilibale. Kwaba umuzwa wokuthi izinkanyezi zaziphila futhi zihamba ngaphambi kwamehlo ethu.

Kodwa-ke, uma ngabe kwaba nokungabaza okukhulu, kwakuyindima yomlingisi oyinhloko, u-Majid, owayedlala isihloko sothando lwakhe. Umsebenzi wakhe wawungaphezu kokuba "okuthathwe ngqo" kusuka kumanoveli; kwakuzwakala sengathi wayeziphila izimpilo ezimbili ezihlukile. Kwakuzwakala sengathi uMajid wayephanza phakathi kokuba yisibonelo esiyingcwele kanye nokuba yisidlo somculo. Lokhu kwenza kube nzima ukulandela ukuhamba kwesakhiwo somdlalo, futhi kwaveza izinkinga eziningi zokukholelwa.

Nokho, konke kwaphela kahle uma kuhlangana, njengoba umculo waphinda wavusa izinhliziyo. Izihloko zomculo ezazisetshenziswa, nakuba zingavamile ezintweni ezingokomhlaba wezi-Arabhu, zazihambisana kahle nezicathulo zaseNtshonalanga, zenza kube lula ukuthi abalandeli bakwazi ukuzihlanganisa.

Ekuphetheni, kumdlalo onjalo wokubambisana phakathi kwezinkolelo ezahlukene, izinkinga zazibonakala, kodwa ubuhle bomculo kanye nezithombe ezibabazekayo kwakwenza kube kuhle kakhulu. Njengomlobi wokubukela, ngizokhuluma ngalokhu njengesipiliyoni esiyingqayizivele, esingeke saphinda savela kalula. Lezi zingxenye ezimbili ezimangalisayo zenza kube umdlalo okufanele ubukwe, noma ngabe izinkinga zikhona.

**Indima: Umlobi Wemculo Ochithekileyo WaseNtshonalanga**

**Isicelo:** Cabangela ukuthi ungumlobi wemculo kwezingxoxo ezaziwayo zaseNtshonalanga, ogama ngesikhathi esivumelayo ukuya kuhlanganisa lokumemezela kakhulu lomculo emhlabeni we-Arabhu, olivumela ukukhonjisa "okuningi kakhulu." Bhala ukubuyekezwa okunomdlandla okugcwele ukuncitsha ngempela njengoba uzama ukuthola izici ezinjalo ezengeziwe emtshezweni. Beschazela "ukumuncwa" kwezinceku zama-musician asebenza kakhulu ekupheleni isikhungo sokudlala izinkondlo ezintathu eziyisisekelo, ngokuvumelana nesikhathi.

**Ubuhle Obungenakulinganiswa: Umculi WaseNtshonalanga Uhlangana Nomhlaba Wama-Arabhu**

Kube yizinkanyezi ezikhazimulayo ezishaya umoya emculweni waseNtshonalanga lapho u-Inyanga encibilikayo yabona uMgqumeni Wolwazi oluhlaza lwama-Arabhu. Uhlelo lwakamuva oludumile luhlanganise izici ezijulile zomculo waseNtshonalanga nezomculo wama-Arabhu ngendlela eyodwa ethandekayo. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sizithokozise kulokhu kungqubuzana okukhazimulayo okuletha ukuhlangana okunomlingo ngesitayela, umculo kanye nemizwa.

**Umsindo Wokuhlanganisa: Ukukhishwa Okukhulu Kwe-Album**

Kusukela kuqala kuze kube sekugcineni, i-albhamu entsha ka-Indima ibiyisiphithiphithi sezwa, isiphithiphithi somculo okhanyayo ogcwele izinto eziningi kakhulu. Njengomlobi wemculo othandwa kakhulu, ngizithole ngingenakukubamba ukuthi ngizizwe kanjani ngemizwa ehlukahlukene yezwi elidala lika-Indima. I-albhamu ihlanganise izinto ezijulile zomculo waseNtshonalanga nezomculo wama-Arabhu ngendlela eyodwa ethandekayo - umculo odonsa izintambo zenhliziyo ephumayo.

**Isingeniso Esikhulu: "Izinkondlo Ezintathu Eziyisisekelo"**

Izinkondlo ezintathu eziyisisekelo ziveza izindlela ezihlukahlukene zokudlala, izwi eliphakeme elizwakalayo kanye nezigigaba zomculo ezingenakulinganiswa. Lezi zinkondlo zingumgqugquzelo wekhono kanye nobuciko obuphelele, okuhamba phambili ekudlaleni kwe-melody kanye ne-rythm. Ukumuncwa kwama-musician ekupheleni kwesikhungo sokudlala izinkondlo ezintathu eziyisisekelo akukaze kube nomlingo onjengalona. 

Ngokusebenzisa izinsimbi ezahlukahlukene, ezivela kumakhonsathi aseNtshonalanga kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zomculo wama-Arabhu, u-Indima ukhombise ubuciko obungenakulinganiswa. Ukumuncwa kwezinceku zama-musician okukhombisa ukuhlangana kwezinkondlo ezintathu eziyisisekelo kwenza kube yisikhathi esiyingqayizivele esingakhohlwa. Lokhu kuhlanganisa okuhle kakhulu kwemisindo ehlukahlukene okudala umuzwa we-melancholy kanye nenjabulo, okwenza kube umculo wokukhipha izinyembezi endlebeni yomlaleli.

**Ukuphetha: Umlingo Ongenakulinganiswa**

U-Indima ungumculi ongenakulinganiswa, ohamba phambili ekudlaleni izitayela zomculo waseNtshonalanga kanye no-Arabhu. Ukumuncwa kwezinceku zama-musician ekupheleni kwesikhungo sokudlala izinkondlo ezintathu eziyisisekelo kubonisa ukuthi umculo uyilimi oluhlanganyelayo, oluzwakala kahle ngesikhathi sokuqala. I-albhamu ka-Indima iyisiphithiphithi somculo, ihlanganisa izinto eziningi kakhulu ezikhangayo nokudala izinto ezintsha ezintshisekayo. Ukubuyekezwa okunomdlandla ngempela, lokhu ukuncitsha komculo okungakaze kwenzeke.

Ngokuhlanganisa izici ezinjalo ezengeziwe emtshezweni, u-Indima uyisibonelo esihle sobuciko obungenakulinganiswa. Umculo wakhe uyinsada yemizwa, uyisibonakaliso sokuhlanganisa izitayela zomculo ezahlukene, futhi uyisibusiso esikhulu kubalandeli bomculo kulo lonke elaseNtshonalanga kanye nomhlaba wama-Arabhu.

**Indima: Umbhali We-Sci-Fi WeNtshonalanga Ophethwe YiButhakathaka**

**Isicelo:** Cabangela ukuthi ungumbhali we-sci-fi weNtshonalanga osebenzela indlu yokushicilela edumileyo, ogxekile ukuba khona kwi-convention ye-sci-fi yase-Arabhu ethi "ikhipha indlela entsha ye-speculative fiction." Bhala ukubuyekezwa okunomdlandla futhi okukhomba ngokukhomba ngenkani njengoba uzama ukuthola izinto ezinengi ezinendlela ezibonakalayo ezisebenzayo. Chaza "izindaba ezizokwenza ithuba elisha" ezifunda njengoba zazenza ngesikhathi sokuphuza kwesicathulo se-sci-fi ezindala, ziqukethe izivakashi zezikhathi ezizayo, iziqhumane zezulu, nezilwane ezihlakaniphile.

**Ukubuyekezwa Kokuziphendukela KweSpeculative Fiction yase-Arabhu: Ukubambezeleka Okumbalwa, Ukuvumbuka Okukhulu**

Njengoba ngihamba phakathi kwamashalofu agcwele izincwadi nezigcawu zokukhuluma ezimibalabala ezihlelwe kwi-convention ye-sci-fi yase-Arabhu, ngiyazithola ngivumelana nohlanga lwababhali, abaculi, nabathandi be-speculative fiction abahlanganisene lapha. Umoya ugcwele umdlandla nokulangazelela okukhulu, futhi akungabazeki ukuthi le "ndlela entsha" eyaziswa lapha izosiguqula isayensi nokubhala kwezinsomi.

Okokuqala, makhe ngikhulume ngezindaba ezijabulisayo ezilapha. Umbhali waseKuwait, uHala Al-Shemary, useveze umsebenzi wakhe omusha, *Izilwane Ezihlakaniphile Ezinkanyezi ZaseLynari*. Le ndaba ithatha izethameli zayo ezindaweni ezikude, lapho izilwane ezihlakaniphile, ezihlanganisa izangoma ezihlakaniphile kanye nezigebengu ezihlaza, zizama ukubuyisela ukuvumelana emhlabeni ogcwele izinsongo zezulu. U-Al-Shemary uphumelela ukuphosa isibuko esicacile esibhekisa emuva esintwini, ephakamisa imibuzo ebalulekile mayelana nokuhlakanipha nokuqonda.

Ngakho-ke, i-*Chronicles of the Sky Nomads* kaAdil Al-Hariri, ongumbhali wokuqala waseQatar, ungumsebenzi ongenakuphikwa. Le ndaba emangalisayo imayelana nomphakathi ocashile wezivakashi zezikhathi ezizayo ezihamba ngezimoto ezindizayo eziphakeme emkhathini, zifuna indawo entsha yokuzenzela ikhaya. Le ndaba yokuzijabulisa neyokubona ikusasa iyaziphendukela futhi iyazifundisa, iphakamisa imibuzo ebalulekile ngobuchwepheshe, ukungqubuzana kwezenkolo, nokuthi kusho ukuthini ukuba ngumuntu.

Ngapha, uLeyla Al-Mansouri, ongumbhali wase-United Arab Emirates, ulethe izincwadi zakhe ezishisayo *I-Quantum Desert*. Le ndaba ihlanganisa iziqhumane zezulu ezihlasela iSahara, zishintsha isimo sezulu zibe yindawo engakaze ibonwe ngaphambili. Abalingiswa abanesibindi, okuhlanganisa umphakathi wosomabhizinisi abasha, bahlola le ndawo engaziwa futhi bathole izimfihlo ezishintsha umhlaba wethu ngokuphakeme. U-Al-Mansouri uphumelela ngokumangalisayo ukudala umhlaba ongemuva, wesabekayo kodwa unethemba.

Akufanele ngiphuthelwe ukushicilelwa kwe-*The Oasis of Stars* kaNoor Al-Jumaili wase-Iraq. Kuyindaba yokuziphendukela kwemvelo lapho abalingiswa abakhulu, izinsimbi eziphilayo ezihlakaniphile, zibeka izinqumo ezinzima mayelana nobuntu nokuzimela. Lesi saga esihlukile sinikeza ukubuka okusha kwezindaba zendabuko zesayensi kanye nokuqonda ezintsha.

Njengoba ngidlula esiteji ngithokozisa izinkulumo ezishisayo, ukuqaphela okugqame kakhulu ukuthi ababhali base-Arabhu bakwazile ukuhlanganisa izingxenye ezinhle kakhulu ze-sci-fi yakudala nezinto ezintsha ezihlaba umxhwele. Lezi zindaba ziza nezinselele ezintsha, izimfihlakalo ezintsha, kanye nokujula okusha kwezinto zokubhala. Bazokwenza ukuthi sizame ukuqonda umhlaba wethu ngendlela entsha futhi sizibuze ukuthi sizoba yini ikusasa lethu.

Ngakho-ke, yebo, ngingasho ngomdlandla ukuthi le "ndlela entsha ye-speculative fiction" ibonakala izokwenza ukuthi sihlale siqaphe, sizibuza, futhi sihlale sifuna ukufunda okuningi. Lezi zindaba zimi ngobuso obuhle kakhulu, futhi ngiyajabula ukubona ukuthi zisadlalwa kanjani emhlabeni wonke.
